name: The Love Machine Learns To Love
name_original: The Love Machine Learns To Love
description:
Spread love throughout the universe. Leave no soul unhappy. What an altruistic goal. Surely there's no strings attached.

Submitted for the BrackeysGameJam. All resources (other than fonts) were self made, and music was done by the (talented) Jono H.

If you LOVEd the game, then please leave a rating, or consider trying out my other games:
https://justcamh.itch.io/
